content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Moulmein Single Member Constituency" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Moulmein Single Member Constituency** was a constituency in Singapore. It used to exist from 1959 to 1988 as **Moulmein Constituency** and was renamed as **Moulmein Single Member Constituency** (SMC) as part of Singapore's political reforms. The SMC was merged into [Kampong Glam Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Kampong_Glam_Group_Representation_Constituency) in 1991. ## Member of Parliament YearMember of ParliamentParty[Legislative Assembly of Singapore](/wiki/Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)**1959**Lin You Eng[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1963**[Avadai Dhanam Lakshimi](/wiki/Avadai_Dhanam_Lakshimi)[Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)**1968**[Lawrence Sia](/wiki/Lawrence_Sia)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**1972****1976****1980****1984****1988** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in 1950s [General Election 1959](/wiki/1959_Singaporean_general_election): Moulmein PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****Lin You Eng** **4,324** **47.25** [SPA](/wiki/Singapore_People%27s_Alliance)Yap Jin Yau3,95543.22[LSP](/wiki/Liberal_Socialist_Party)Tan Peng Khoo8729.53Majority3694.03[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)10,095Total valid votes9,15198.92Rejected ballots1001.08[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)9,25191.64[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) ### Elections in 1960s [General Election 1963](/wiki/1963_Singaporean_general_election): Moulmein PartyCandidateVotes%±%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****[Avadai Dhanam Lakshimi](/wiki/Avadai_Dhanam_Lakshimi)** **5,856** **58.00** **10.75** [BS](/wiki/Barisan_Sosialis)Tann Wee Tiong3,05130.22N/A[SA](/wiki/Singapore_Alliance)Koh Chiat Lim5425.37N/A[UPP](/wiki/United_People%27s_Party_(Singapore))Neo Hay Chan5755.69N/A[Independent](/wiki/Independent_(politics))Soo Tho Siu Hee730.72N/A[Majority](/wiki/Majority#Related_terms)2,80527.7814.47[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)10,6705.7Total valid votes10,09799.220.3Rejected ballots790.780.3[Turnout](/wiki/Voter_turnout)10,17695.373.73[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **hold**[Swing](/wiki/Swing_(politics))10.75 This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub.
